title: 为什么Minecraft官网注册后无法登录
author: Cold-Pot
txt_content:
我在官网注册了一个Mojang账号，邮箱是用的outlook.com，但是最近三天我再去登录的时候，填写完Recaptcha，就没反应了，再点按钮又出来一个Recaptcha，尽量不用魔法上网解决
控制台消息：
A cookie associated with a cross-site resource at https://microsoft.com/ was set without the `SameSite` attribute. A future release of Chrome will only deliver cookies with cross-site requests if they are set with `SameSite=None` and `Secure`. You can review cookies in developer tools under Application>Storage>Cookies and see more details at https://www.chromestatus.com/feature/5088147346030592 and https://www.chromestatus.com/feature/5633521622188032.


A cookie associated with a cross-site resource at http://microsoft.com/ was set without the `SameSite` attribute. A future release of Chrome will only deliver cookies with cross-site requests if they are set with `SameSite=None` and `Secure`. You can review cookies in developer tools under Application>Storage>Cookies and see more details at https://www.chromestatus.com/feature/5088147346030592 and https://www.chromestatus.com/feature/5633521622188032.


Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 401 (Unauthorized)


Failed to load resource: net::ERR_CERT_COMMON_NAME_INVALID


Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: Failed to fetch


Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 429 (Too Many Requests)
有大神知道怎么回事吗，是MC官网除了Recaptcha还用了404网页的其它服务？Mojang日常抽风的几率很小，我连续三天都是一样的结果，难道只能用黑卡玩了？

replies.author: Cold-Pot
replies.txt_content:
模组唐三 发表于 2020-4-6 10:47
你付钱了吗？
我说的不是启动器，是官网，官网登不进去付钱都不行

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:

挂梯子试试八

replies.author: Cold-Pot
replies.txt_content:
sensen1234 发表于 2020-4-6 14:08
梯子挂了吗？
Recaptcha我用浏览器插件解决的，梯子倒是没挂

replies.author: Cold-Pot
replies.txt_content:
我看了下 以上的回答并没有解决我的问题
我上百度了一下错误代码，接着看了一下hosts文件，里面奇迹般的有个
51.68.172.243 authserver.mojang.com
51.68.172.243 sessionserver.mojang.com
我把这两行删掉过后，官网显示“登录成功，正在重定向……”

总结一下：
failed to fetch 和 429 错误的原因是访问人数太多
如果出现net::ERR_CERT_COMMON_NAME_INVALID，那么请打开C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc下的hosts文件，将含有mojang.com的两行删掉，使用管理员权限保存

不过还是感谢大家的帮助！
